## 测试 / Testing

请确认您已完成以下测试：

Please confirm you have completed the following tests:

- [ ] 已在 NaviTerm 中测试 / Tested in NaviTerm
- [ ] 脚本正常运行 / Script runs correctly
- [ ] 无错误输出 / No error output
- [ ] 已测试错误处理 / Tested error handling
- [ ] 已验证 API 可用性 / Verified API availability

## 代码质量 / Code Quality

- [ ] 包含中英文双语注释 / Includes bilingual comments (Chinese & English)
- [ ] 遵循现有代码风格 / Follows existing code style
- [ ] 包含错误处理 / Includes error handling
- [ ] 日志输出清晰 / Clear logging output
